function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High human traffic and social interactions increase the risk of contagious disease transmission.","Impact":"Uncontrolled transmission of contagious diseases can lead to outbreaks and public health crises.","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene protocols, promoting vaccination, and regulating the flow of people.","Technologies":"Surveillance systems for monitoring crowd density, air purification systems, contactless technology for transactions.","People":"Members, staff, visitors, and the wider public.","Owner":"Management, public health authorities, and government regulators."}]}
